channel.title: AMA with Rand Fishkin & Promise Phelon this week
channel.description:
Two interesting online AMAs this week that might be interesting for different reasons.
Rand Fishkin (today), who gave a very honest talk recently at BoS Europe about the mistakes and regrets he has had in growing Moz, (and some of the things that he wouldn't change).
Promise Phelon (Thursday), one time head of product at BEA, now CEO of TapInfluence, who will be talking at this year's BoS USA on what culture really means in business.
[Join Hangouts Here.](http://businessofsoftware.org/2016/08/ask-rand-fishkin-and-promise-phelon-anything-23rd-and-25th-august/?utm_medium=3PBlog&utm_campaign=RandPromiseHangouts&utm_source=Bootstrapped&utm_content=AMA)
